summary: Adds a redone version of a standalone Vampire Follower Eileen. (CBBE/UNP/SevenBase/7BO)
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#d5a6bd][size=2]*I play Skyrim on a low-end laptop so I am not using any sort of ENB for a nice screenshot. 
If you can be so kind to provide some picturesque screenshot of Semira, I would be very much delighted! ^^
[/size]
[size=3]~(Screenshots from bodytypes other than CBBE is very, very much Appreciated!)~[/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]=Description= [/b][/size][/color]
This Mod is a [b][color=#00ff00]REDONE[/color][/b] version of an original follower [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20521/?]Eileen[/url], a Vampire Follower who is marriageable and can be found locked in a cage in North Brittleshin Pass.
Since she's lock in a cage, you would want to bring some lockpicks to rescue her.
She starts with a roughspun tunic and no weapons, so do provide them for her if you plan to bring her along in your adventure. 
She also has a journal in her cage which provides some information about things she had to go through during her capture. 
[color=#ff0000]
[/color][b][size=4][color=#ff0000]=Backstory=[/color]
[/size][/b]Eileen is a lively young girl who used to live in Falkreath. One day while she's out alone to gather some herbs near a gloomy cave, she was attacked by a vampire. She struggled in order to escape, but by the time she got away from the vampire's hand, she had already been bitten. She ran as hard as she could as the vampire pursued her. During the chase, some hunters who happened to be hunting in the same area saw the vampire was running about, so immediately they struck some arrows on to the vile vampire's head, but somehow they did not notice Eileen as she had already ran far away in terror from where the vampire was pinned down. 

Eileen knew that anyone who was bitten by a vampire will turn into one of them after given some time. She knew that there's no place to go home to since returning to her town in her new form would definitely be suicide. Due to the fatigue that was caused by all that running and transformation process, she fell on her knees and started to lost conscious...

By the time she came to her senses, she noticed that she was barred in a cage inside a cave of an unknown location. It seemed that she was captured by some insane necromancer who's currently working on his vile arts on corpses and the undead. Alone and in danger, she holds out for a hero to come and free her from her misery~
(Pretty cliched, but just for the sake of doing it~) XD

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]=Changelog=[/b][/size][/color]
v1.1: Made her a proper Vampire race, added fangs & wings placeholder, reworked skills & perks.
v1.0: Initial Release.

[b]*NOTE: [/b][size=4]Animated Dragon Wings[/size] is [b][u][color=#ff0000][size=4]NOT REQUIRED[/size][/color][/u][/b] for this mod to work [color=#ff0000][size=4]IF YOU DON'T WANT THE WINGS[/size].[/color] 
The wings are only [b][color=#ff0000]Optional.[/color][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]
[size=4]=Eileen's Wings D.I.Y. Tutorial=[/size][/color][/b]
*Credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3061399]david758[/url] for tutorial.

1) Download & Install the Main file.
2) Download & Install Preferred Body type. (Optional)
3) Download & Install Update 1.1.
4) Download & Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271]Animated Dragon Wings[/url] by Anton.
5) Run the Game.
6) Open Console by pressing "~" on the keyboard.
6) Type "[color=#ffff00]help eileen[/color]" and scroll up (Key:Page Up) to search for [color=#ffff00]ARMO: (ID) 'Eileen's Wing Placeholder '[/color]. 
*Example: [color=#ffff00]ARMO: (d600b4r5) 'Eileen's Wing Placeholder' [/color]
7) Write down the ID for "Eileen's Wings Placeholder" item somewhere so you can remember it.
8) Type "[color=#ff00ff]help wing[/color]" and scroll up and find [color=#ff00ff]MGEF:  (ID) "(any of preferred Antons dragon wings; Recommended: Alduin)"[/color]
*Example: [color=#ff00ff]MGEF: (D9000d65) 'Alduin Animated Dragon Wings'[/color]
9) Write down the ID for your preferred wing type somewhere so you can remember it.
10) type "[color=#00ff00]playerenchantobject[/color] [color=#ffff00][Eileen's placeholder wing item's ID][/color] [color=#ff00ff][Preferred wing's MGEF ID][/color]
*Example: [color=#00ff00]playerenchantobject[/color] [color=#ffff00]d600b4r5[/color] [color=#ff00ff]d9000d65 [/color]
11) If done correctly, Eileen's Wing Placeholder equipment should appear in your inventory.
12) Talk to Eileen and ask to Trade item.
13) Give her the newly obtained item.
14) Eileen obtained WINGS!
*Also works with other NPC or player as well.

[color=#ff0000][size=4]=Stats=[/size][/color]
Gender: Female
Height: 0.97
Weight: 10
Race: Nord (Vampire)
Voice: Female Young Eager
Body Type: CBBE /Sevenbase/UNP/7BO
Class: Vampire
Proficiency: One-Handed, Light Armor, Destruction, Conjuration
Known Spells: Vampiric Drain, Conjure Gargoyle, Raise Zombie
Location: North/South Brittleshin Pass (Can't miss it)
[color=#ff0000]
[size=4][b]=Requirements=[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url]
 (Prevents weird body mesh behavior & The ONLY reason for your game to CTD if you have this mod without it!)
[color=#f6b26b]Dawnguard DLC[/color]
[color=#ff0000]
[b][size=4]=Not Required but HIGHLY Recommended=[/size][/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Followers Tweak[/url]
(For many reasons...Check the mod page for more information)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO [/url]
(To make Eileen be more talkative instead of a soulless husk following you around)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My home is your home[/url]
(To set change her default location to somewhere else other than her original location, i.e Whiterun's Bannered Mare so you won't have any trouble finding her after being dismissed)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17483/?]Magical Markers[/url]
(Give this to her before dismissing her to know where she is after being dismissed)

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]=Installation=[/b][/size][/color]
Drop all the files in Skyrim/Data folder

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]=FAQ=[/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]Q: What's the difference between the Reincarnation version and the Original version?
[/size]A: Mostly Aesthetics. I remade her using the latest version of ECE, changed her hair style,
added some tattoos & tints, added some new spells, more bodytype support.

Q: No Wings?
A: Sorry, she doesn't have any originally, but I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32691/?]This [/url]mod for her wings in my screenshot.

Q: Armors in Screenshot?
A: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69488/?]Vampire Cuirass[/url] by newmiller & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]Tera Armor[/url] (Deathskin) by Asianboy345 & NCsoft
[color=#ff0000]
[b][size=4]=Conflicts & Bugs=[/size][/b][/color]
Should be none but may be possible with any mods that alters Brittleshin Pass's interior.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]=Credits=[/size][/color][/b]

author: ZReincarnation
